job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Check is a payrollasaservice API that lets you embed payroll directly in your vertical SaaS HR or timetracking platform Our API abstracts away the complexities of running payroll tax calculation remittance and filing plus the movement of money between companies and employees This enables companies to easily build fully integrated payroll products to offer to their customersbrbrEngineering is the core of Check We believe payroll can and should be easytouse financial software but getting there requires serious and sustained engineering effort For our efforts there is the deep satisfaction that comes from delivering peoples paychecks We are excited to bring on a new software engineer who will have an outsized impact on our systems and business along multiple frontsbrbrFor this role we are seeking an individual with strong fullstack software engineering skills but also with a curiosity for systems an entrepreneurial mindset and high integrity We believe that someone with this combination will unlock new ideas and solutions for our product and thrive in our teambrbrstrongIn this role you willbrbrstrongul liShip code that calculates transfers and files taxes accurately and on time on a daily basisli liDistill the complexities of payroll into simple APIs for developers to use to build payrollli liBuild frontend and backend components that improve customer integrationsli liInfluence the culture values and processes of a growing engineering teamli liCommunicate ideas and specifications through detailed precise writingli liWork with our payroll ops design sales and legal functionsli liCommit on your first day and deploy code continuouslyli liSupport developers at customer companiesli liTeach and learn from other engineersli liInterview prospective candidatesli brbrulstrongMany backgrounds could fit this role but ideal candidates will havebrbrstrongul li3 years of experience li liBuilt and scaled production web applications on the frontend andor backendli liProduction relational database experienceli liDemonstrated product and design sensibilitiesli liStrong software development fundamentalsli liExcellent verbal and written communicationli brbrulstrongWe usebrbrstrongul liPython typeannotated and Django for our APIli liReact and TypeScript for our frontendsli liPostgres for our databaseli liAWS for our cloud infrastructureli liGitLab for issue tracking and CICDli brbrulOur team is distributed across the US with hubs in New York City and San FranciscobrbrDont see a role that fits your interests If youre passionate about working at Check email us at hellocheckhqcom and tell us how youd like to helpbrbremCheck is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action employer We do not discriminate based upon race religion color national origin sex including pregnancy childbirth or related medical conditions sexual orientation gender gender identity gender expression transgender status sexual stereotypes age status as a protected veteran status as an individual with a disability or other applicable legally protected characteristics We also consider qualified applicants with criminal histories consistent with applicable federal state and local law Check is committed to providing reasonable accommodations for candidates with disabilities in our recruiting process If you need any assistance or accommodations due to a disability please let us know at ememhellocheckhqcomemem with accommodations in the subject lineem
